abstract.p: Steven Karner letter corrects Richard Eder's May 14 review of Michael Ondaatje' book Anil's Ghost

block.p: Richard Eder's review of ''Anil's Ghost'' (May 14), by Michael Ondaatje, reminded me why I so enjoy the author, and I look forward to reading his new novel. However, Eder incorrectly recalls a scene from ''The English Patient'' in which the examination of the frescoes in a darkened church affirms the ability to ''fly above war's destruction.'' In Ondaatje's novel, the sapper hoists a medievalist professor, rather than a nurse, to examine by rope and lighted flare the church fresco. Your reviewer is recalling the subsequent film.
